verbs.description: [ARG0: Campaign Action Private prison profiteers] [V: make] [ARG1: a fortune] [ARG2: off the imprisonment of immigrant bodies] — private prison company CoreCivic stocks went up 140 percent after Donald Trump ’s election — and the detention of migrant children torn from their parents ...
